original_text: But whoever does what is true comes to the light, so that it may be clearly seen that his works have been carried out in God.”
korean_text: 진리를 따르는 자는 빛으로 오나니 이는 그 행위가 하나님 안에서 행한 것임을 나타내려 함이라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But whoever does what is true
so that it may be clearly seen
that his works have been carried out in God
